theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.NAME: Celestial Brew
theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Discard your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:QuickSip.NAME: Quick Sip
theBrewmaster:QuickSip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain [E]. Draw a card.

theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.NAME: Perplexing Brew
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when played.
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain 2{!Location!|>0,<0= Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when drawn.|0= }{!M!|@=|0=Strength.|1=Thorns.|2=Dexterity.}

theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.NAME: Double Fist
theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Brew card is played twice.

theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.NAME: Fluid Motion
theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 10% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as Block.

theBrewmaster:Homebrew.NAME: Homebrew
theBrewmaster:Homebrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. This card gains !theBrewmaster:M2! thebrewmaster:Intoxication when drawn until played.

theBrewmaster:Belch.NAME: Belch
theBrewmaster:Belch.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!theBrewmaster:intoxicated!|0=Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Stun an enemy instead.|1=Intoxicated: Stun an enemy.|-1=Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Stun an enemy instead.}
theBrewmaster:Belch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!theBrewmaster:intoxicated!|0=Stun an enemy.|1=Stun an enemy. Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to the rest.|-1=Stun an enemy. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to the rest.}

theBrewmaster:LeanIn.NAME: Lean In
theBrewmaster:LeanIn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume 10% of your intoxication. Deal {!M!|2=#gtwice }that much damage.

theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.NAME: Fortifying Brew
theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain double that amount instead.

theBrewmaster:SoberUp.NAME: Sober Up
theBrewmaster:SoberUp.DESCRIPTION: Consume 100% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Gain [E] for every !M! consumed. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenIdea.NAME: Drunken Idea
theBrewmaster:DrunkenIdea.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard 1 card. Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}, discard 1 card instead.

theBrewmaster:Stagger.NAME: Stagger
theBrewmaster:Stagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, stun them.

theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.NAME: Purifying Brew
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a Status card, gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication.
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a #gStatus #or #Curse card, gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.NAME: Pocket Flask
theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Brew, gain 10 thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:KSKeg.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 #ySmash to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 #gSmash+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSKegP.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 #ySmash to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 #gSmash+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmash.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 #yKeg to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 #gKeg+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 #yKeg to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 #gKeg+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.
